name: Tea Time for Mr. Wolf (unfinished)
description:
Walk towards Mr. Wolf using 'W' and stop before he turns around (he can't see your piggy self because of in-game lore concerning poor vision)

Mervan "Marv" Mustafa - Student ID 2071094 - Programming

Alex Keeley - Student ID 2118264 - Artist

This is a short one-button game assigned to us at the university
